(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Conditional 
        (Arg 
          (Primary 
            (Lhs 
              (Variable 
                (Identifier "case2"))))) 
        (Arg 
          (Primary 
            (Lhs 
              (Variable 
                (Identifier "case1"))))) 
        (Arg 
          (Primary 
            (Lhs 
              (Variable 
                (Identifier "foo")))))))))
